'''Príncipo Tarvisi Vadremino III me Revua''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The prince of the city-state of [Revua](/revua/) is one of the principal investors in the company - and one who holds a particular interest in animancy.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/): Tarvisi takes part in [Director Castol](/directorCastol/)'s trial.

[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
